Player History
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 3/3/1987 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 7/18/1989 with a Stiff Neck, out for 6 days...
Injured on 8/21/1989 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 4 weeks...
Had first career hit on 7/7/1990, off Zane Smith (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/1991, off Frank Viola (STL)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/15/1991, hitting .615 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Injured on 6/16/1991 with a Broken Jaw, out for 4 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/15/1992, hitting .462 with 6 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1992...
Drove in 6 runs against Los Angeles on 4/26/1993...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/1/1993, hitting .412 with 6 HR, 14 RBI...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Seattle on 6/1/1993 (Going to PIT: P Charles Nagy, C Chris Hoiles, 2B Harold Reynolds, CF Kirby Puckett. Going to SEA: C Mike Lieberthal, RF Albert Belle, SS Alex Rodrigu
ez)...
Was selected to the 1993 Allstar game...
